Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Hofton Avenue, just north of the Embassy Court.
Room.LongDescription: The two predominant minority races in Oceancrest are the elves and dwarves. Both races have cities of their own, and the embassies to the south provide their people with a link to their heritage. In addition, the embassies provide a unified, political voice to the government with sympathies towards their own race.
